lsst Namespace Reference

Interpolate over all masked pixels in a Chunk Exposure's image using one of several interpolation methods. More...


Namespaces

namespace  ip

Detailed Description

Interpolate over all masked pixels in a Chunk Exposure's image using one of several interpolation methods.

Remove all non-astronomical source counts from the Chunk Exposure's pixels.

The sequence of sub-stages within the Instrument Signature Removal (ISR) stage of the nightly IPP are as follows:

(0) Assemble Chunk Exposure (1) Saturation Correction for Chunk Exposure (2) Overscan Correct Chunk Exposure (3) Trim Chunk Exposure (4) Bias Correct Chunk Exposure (5) Dark Current Correct Chunk Exposure (6) Mask Bad Pixels in Chunk Exposure (7) Linearize Chunk Exposure (8) Flat Correct Chunk Exposure (8a) Pupil Image Correction (8b) Geometric Distortion Correction (8c) Scattered Light Correction (9) Mask Optical Ghosts and Diffraction Spikes (10) Defringe Chunk Exposure (--) Background Sky Correction (--) Crosstalk Correct Chunk Exposure (--) Cosmic Ray Detection??

Crosstalk Correction will be incorporated as an individual sub-stage for the Archive Center ISR stage. It is not currently part of the nightly ISR stage as we receive a crosstalk corrected image from the camera for the nightly pipeline.
